https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tkZH2VpnSmHyA1neezqNIwDYrMU.jpg Miles Peterson was a man who had it all: wealth, status, success. Still something was lacking. Then, in his darkest hour, the words of a single book gave Miles Peterson the burning desire to know God. Bibleman: Shattering The Prince Of Pride
